details.description: At Platform Coffee, we’re all about people — building community, making connections, and serving exceptional coffee along the way. We roast all our coffee right here on-site, so every cup is as fresh as it gets. Whether you’re stopping in for your daily go-to or meeting up with a friend, our team is here to welcome you with genuine hospitality and make every visit feel special.

reviews_data.review_text: Delicious food and amazing coffee!
One of the best coffee shops in CLT! Their roast is excellent and breakfast is too!
If you have not had the avocado toast here, you’re missing out! I’ll be going back weekly for this. Always love the service and my iced coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We’re so glad you love the avocado toast, it’s one of our favorites too! Thanks for the kind words about the service and coffee. Can’t wait to have you back!

reviews_data.review_text:
This is an incredible space. It’s very open with plenty of seating.

I ordered the platform breakfast with scrambled eggs, bacon & toast. Everything hit. The eggs were great. The bacon was phenomenal. I also got a london fog with oatmilk and it was great. It tastes a lot better after you let it sit for a little while, very tasty!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Okay, now we’re hungry again after reading your review! Thank you for the love on the Platform Breakfast and your London Fog, so glad you enjoyed everything.

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee, great food options!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much! We’re so glad you’re enjoying the coffee and food.

reviews_data.review_text: Excellent breakfast sandwich and croissant. I think it’s needs some acid like a tomato slice to balance the flavor. Solid drip.  Latte is a bit small.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Happy to hear you enjoyed the breakfast and drink! Thanks for sharing your thoughts - your feedback is appreciated. Excited to have you back for another round soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Love this new coffee place! The vibes are immaculate, lots of seating. Great place to work remotely.

The coffee is super good and comes out super fast. Also have tried a couple of their items off their food menu and they’re pretty solid! My favorite so far is their steak wrap off of the lunch menu. It’s a bit small, but very good.

Overall would definitely recommend trying Platform out!

review_questions.Group size: 2 people, 3-4 people, 5-8 people, Suitable for all group sizes
review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Sophie! Thank you so much for this thoughtful review — we’re really glad you found us and that you’ve been enjoying your visits! We love being a spot where people can settle in and work, meet up with friends, or just enjoy a good cup of coffee. Also, shoutout to the steak wrap — that one’s a team favorite too! Thanks again for the support and for helping spread the word.

reviews_data.review_text: Really enjoyed my coffee and breakfast burrito. The aioli sauce in the burrito was a nice touch. I ordered the moonlight latte which had ube and coconut. Great combination. The place had a great vibe as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad to hear you loved your time with us! Our Moonlight latte is one of our signature drinks and a big favorite! Thanks for taking the time to share — hope to see you back in soon for another round!

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee! I had and iced americano and I loved it! Definitely good quality beans! It was extremely busy on Saturday morning!
reviews_data.owner_answer: So glad you enjoyed the iced americano! We’re all about using quality beans— and just as much about roasting them right for the best flavor. Love hearing that it came through. Saturdays are definitely full of energy, and we’re honored that our space feels like the place to be!

reviews_data.review_text:
Platform is actually amazing! I've been here once when they first opened and most recently today & yesterday back to back. This place is always packed no matter the hours no matter the day. Plenty of parking as well.

Yesterday, I ordered an everything bagel toasted with cream cheese - which is surprisingly delicious (as a Jersey girl), an iced vanilla latte - which is SO delish, and scrambled eggs - which is great as well.

Highly recommend!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow— thank you for the amazing review! It means a lot coming from a Jersey girl with high bagel standards 😉 Our bagels are sourdough and made in-house, and honestly, we can’t get enough of them either! Thank you for being with us— we love being a spot people want to return to. 🫶 Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffee shop in Charlotte - the food is amazing! Coffee is great, employees are all so nice, we come here every Saturday morning for breakfast and look forward to it all week.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much! We’re thrilled to be your go-to spot every Saturday mornin. It means the world to us! Our team will keep serving up great coffee and delicious food for our amazing guests like you. Can’t wait to see you next weekend!

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee, good food, and love the seating areas (inside and outside). Great place to have coffee meets.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Really appreciate the kind words. Thanks for making us your go-to coffee meet up spot.

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much! We're glad you enjoyed the coffee— hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
The breakfast sandwich was honestly a bit of a letdown. We ordered it with scrambled egg, bacon, and american cheese on what was supposed to be sourdough--but we're pretty sure it was multigrain. There were oats on the crust, it tasted and looked like the kind of sandwich bread you'd buy at the grocery store. Nothing wrong with that, but for $14, we were hoping for something a little better.

Also, just a heads-up: the menu says the sandwich is $12, but there's an extra unadvertised $2 charge to add egg. Yes, egg--on a breakfast sandwich. We didn't ask for extra or anything. I asked about the upcharge after noticing the sandwich showing $14.00 on the receipt, and the employee mentioned that staff have brought it up with management multiple times, but nothing's changed. Even more frustrating: if you order the same sandwich online, there's no $2 upcharge.

We'll still support this place because the coffee and biscuits are good, but we'll probably pass on the other food from now on.

Platform Coffee is not for the community. They've chosen to capitalize on the current economic crisis by levying a TWO-DOLLAR surcharge on all egg dishes. This is absurd, considering that right now, an entire dozen of eggs (that's 12 eggs, people) costs only about $4.30 right down the road at the nearest Harris Teeter. And that's assuming that PC doesn't purchase their eggs wholesale at an even lower price. 12 eggs are $4.30, or roughly 40 cents each, but Platform Coffee wants to charge you $2.00 for an egg, citing "the current egg shortage." This is nothing short of extortionate. Perhaps a 50-cent surcharge could be understood, but $2 is blatantly greedy, and such a distasteful business practice leaves a bad taste in my mouth, as does their mediocre coffee.

Even when this current egg shortage ends, I'll still stay away from Platform Coffee, because I know these are/were their business ethics during a time of community crisis. Not Just Coffee is only a little further down the road on Jay Street. They serve up a better latte and are actually good neighbors in the West Charlotte community.
Very good coffee and loved the burger for lunch. I come here to work and hang out. Highly recommend if you want a cool coffe shop to hang out at. Outdoor seating, great location, good coffee!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're happy to be a spot where you can relax, get things done, and enjoy good coffee and food. It means a lot to have your support!

reviews_data.review_text: Pour over was awesome!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks so much! We're glad you enjoyed the pour over — there’s nothing like a slow brew done right. Hope to see you again soon for another cup!







Thanks so much! We're so glad you enjoyed the pour over—there’s nothing like a slow brew done right. Hope to see you again soon for another cup!

reviews_data.review_text: The absolute best atmosphere, experience and good eats
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're all about good experiences, great food, and making every visit memorable — so this kind of feedback really makes our day.

reviews_data.review_text:
My sister and I had the egg biscuit, waffle, and coffee. I thought the food was alright but my sister thought it was all awful. I had a coffee with sugar free syrup and it was the worst I've ever tasted. The atmosphere also felt very pretentious.

I went to school in this area and am sad to see cutesy businesses like this one and soulless apartment complexes pushing out the people who used to live here. Gentrification is not a crime but its not victimless either.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We’re truly sorry your experience didn’t reflect the heart behind what we do, as we aim to serve this neighborhood with love, hospitality, and excellence. We hear you and are grateful for the chance to keep learning and growing.

reviews_data.review_text: I’m visiting from out of town, and one of my favorite Youtubers lives in Charlotte and talked about this place. It certainly exceeded all expectations! The YouTuber had already mentioned that it was one of the best matches she had, so of course I wanted to try that. And to my surprise, they also had a bunch of different food options. I got the chicken quesadilla with Cajun fries and a mock tail. I also got the matcha with cinnamon and honey (Recommended by one of the baristas. I didn’t get his name, but he was so incredibly kind!!!!). I didn’t even know that existed, but it was actually the best Matcha I’ve ever had. The customer service was incredible. Everyone was sooo nice.  That atmosphere was amazing as well. I had an amazing time visiting all the way from Virginia. The next time I come to Charlotte, I will certainly be stopping here again!!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We’re so glad we got to be part of your Charlotte visit! Big thanks to your favorite YouTuber for the shoutout — we love that it led you our way and that we got the opportunity to meet you. That cinnamon honey matcha is a sleeper hit, and we're so glad our team made you feel welcome. Can’t wait to have you back next time you’re in town!

reviews_data.review_text:
Please put up a sign asking people to give their table to waiting patrons as this place is always full of laptop people that order 1 coffee and park off for the morning.
Service has dropped drastically!
Owner needs to come back please
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate your support and are always working to improve the experience for everyone who walks through our doors. Exciting news— a coworking space, called Spur Line Creative, is currently being built out in the same building! We’re confident it’ll be a huge benefit to those who love the atmosphere here but want a dedicated space to work alongside other like-minded people. If anyone’s interested, just ask a barista for more info or a quick tour— desks are already booking out!

reviews_data.review_text: I have been here numerous times and I have given this place a real chance. However, lately the quality has truly gone down. The yogurt bowl size decreased quite a bit from the previous portion, the pastries were incredibly stale and inedible. The worst part is the coffee tastes watered down and low quality. The portion for a large coffee is smaller than a grande. I truly love supporting local businesses but I can’t recommend this place. Hoping they improve.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback— we’re always striving to improve and we take all feedback seriously. If anything isn’t to your liking during your visit, please don’t hesitate to let us know right away— we’re always happy to assist and make things right. Your input helps us ensure a better experience moving forward!

reviews_data.review_text: It was my first time here. We ordered a coconut ube latte, breakfast sandwich, avocado toast with egg and bacon, and waffle with bananas and strawberries. They make all their syrups in house. The food was very good and fresh. They kindly gave us a free baked good. We will be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for sharing your experience! We’re so happy you enjoyed the drinks and dishes. Our goal is always to serve fresh, high-quality food and drinks, and we’re glad we hit the mark.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is beautiful and has great space. I feel like I need to try it one more time because I went in yesterday and felt completely ignored, like I was bothering them by being there. I get when people are busy but it takes a few seconds to just say “hi, we’ll be right with you” and instead at least 5 employees walked right by us and avoided eye contact as we waited to order. It was probably just an “off” moment and I will try again. Once the young woman came to help she was kind and gave some recommendations on the pastries.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you for the kind words about our space. We're so sorry to hear that your visit left you feeling overlooked—that’s never the kind of experience we want anyone to have, and it's certainly not reflective of the hospitality we strive for. 

We appreciate your graciousness in recognizing it may have been an off moment, but we'll be addressing this with our team right away to ensure proper attentiveness moving forward. We'd be honored to welcome you back for the experience you deserved the first time around.

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffee in town, and an amazing atmosphere to visit. Staff is also great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you! We’re so happy you had a great time with us. Our team loves making every visit special, and we can't wait to welcome you back!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Richard, this put a smile on our face! Glad you love the breakfast burrito. See you next time!

reviews_data.review_text: Favorite coffee spot in Charlotte!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You just made our day, Jessica! We love being your go-to spot in CLT!

reviews_data.review_text: Lattes syrups are made is house which is always a bonus. Came around 8am on a Saturday morning and only a few people ahead of us in line. By the time we left around 9am there were over 15 people waiting in line. Breakfast was ok. I had the platform breakfast; hashbrowns were kind of greasy. My biggest complaint was the this was not served with sourdough bread as advertised but rather a whole grain (part of the reason i picked this dish was for the bread)
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thanks so much for visiting and for sharing your thoughts, Elisabeth! We feel it's important to clarify that we do serve sourdough bread as advertised, and our team is even testing sourdough bagels currently, made fresh in-house, which we’ll be offering soon!

Since sourdough is more about the fermentation process than a specific type or shape of bread, it can sometimes appear different from the traditional rustic loaves. We're passionate about sourdough for its delicious flavor and health benefits, like improved digestion, and are thrilled to share it with our guests.

We understand that meeting expectations is key to a great dining experience, and we strive to communicate our offerings clearly. Should you have any questions or concerns during your next visit, please don't hesitate to ask. We’d love to connect and ensure your experience is fantastic. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and hope to earn those 5 stars!

reviews_data.review_text: This place was awesome. Beautiful space, great snacks, drinks, food. I was so glad they serve breakfast all day!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words! We love hearing how people enjoy all the aspects we pour our hearts into. It’s wonderful to know the experience hit the mark for you!

reviews_data.review_text:
Everything about Platform Coffee is amazing! Delicious food, a variety of coffee/tea options, and lots of seating indoors and outdoors! This is the perfect place to meet up with colleagues, friends, family, etc. or just come by yourself to work for the morning or afternoon!

Check out the salads and steak wrap!! My personal favorites.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We really appreciate your thoughtful review! It means a lot to know you’ve felt at home here. We're always working to make Platform a place people love coming back to!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this place! The atmosphere is peaceful yet vibrant - I love all the plants and greenery, and there’s always cheerful chatty vibes when it gets busy. Plenty of seating inside and outside, and ordering online to-go is also an easy move! The staff has always been so chipper and kind. Love bringing family and friends here, or going solo to sip & read. Their breakfast sandwich and honey cinnamon latte is my weakness!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the shoutout, Cait! We're happy that we can be an extension of your home - giving you a space to enjoy with friends or family here. Our breakfast sandwich is a STAR and something everyone needs to experience!

reviews_data.review_text: Good coffee
reviews_data.owner_answer: Glad you enjoyed our coffee, Dan. Hope to serve you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this space and their coffee… highly recommend their Cajun fries and steak!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Great recommendation, Jasmine! Our fries really do make the perfect side for many of our dishes. See you soon for another round!

reviews_data.review_text: Hidden gem on the west side. Beautiful location, amazing service, just about every staff person is helpful and incredibly friendly. Good variety of breakfast & lunch. Can't wait for their menu to keep growing!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Absolutely, Lorena! Thanks for shining a spotlight on our cozy corner of the west side. We're already brewing up some exciting new additions to our menu and we can't wait for you to try them!

reviews_data.review_text: Platform Coffee is a must do in Charlotte; it's become my new favorite coffee shop. I got an iced latte with honey and oatmilk, and it's probably the best latte I've had. I really love the taste of their coffee; it's freshly brewed in house- I got a bag of espresso to make lattes at home. There is plenty of space indoors and outdoors to sit and work- tables, comfy chairs, and couches. The atmosphere is conducive and peaceful for working. The staff is friendly and have already remembered my name although I've only been a few times. I also really loved how they were playing Christian music a few times when I've visited. They have cute merchandise as well. I didn't try the food but from what I saw and smelled it looked delicious. Platform Coffee is 10/10!

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Jessie! Thanks for the amazing review—we're so happy to be your new go-to spot. We love that you appreciate our coffee not just in our cafe but also at home. Did you know you can enjoy our coffee everywhere? We can bring the Platform Coffee experience to your business or workplace too! Can’t wait for you to try our food on your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: One of my new favorite spots! The Amaretti latte was incredible and the treats I got were so good!! The staff were fantastic as well!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so glad you've discovered us, Dylan! Our treats are crafted fresh in-house — they're dangerously good, aren't they?

reviews_data.review_text: Wow, almost five-star reviews truly highlight how amazing this place is! I can’t wait to return and indulge in their expertly crafted drinks, mouthwatering food, and the fantastic hospitality. The atmosphere is just the cherry on top! This experience has me counting down the days until I’m back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Your countdown to your next visit is on, and so is ours! We're happy everything hit the mark for you today. Thanks so much for the glowing review, Bryan!

reviews_data.review_text: I give this place 5 stars all across the board. I love the modern aesthetics. This place is spacious, clean, comfortable and peaceful. I got the Lavender Peppercorn Latte with Almond Milk. It was good the peppercorn definitely outweighs the lavender. I made a commitment to try all of coffee shops and Southern based restaurant chains but I gained 8 pounds since I started. Yikes! But everything in Charlotte that I tried so far been so good. It is too hard for me to slow down. This coffee shop also has a nice outdoor section. You need to come check it out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kara, thanks for your stellar review and for making Platform Coffee a part of your Charlotte adventure. We love playing around with flavors like in our seasonal Lavender Peppercorn Latte — it’s always fun to see what hits the spot! Loved that you appreciated our indoor and outdoor areas too. Looking forward to your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Great atmosphere. The staff is super friendly. Coffee solid!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Abigail, We're thankful you felt the warmth and friendliness of our team—they really are the stars of Platform Coffee. It’s always our goal to make your experience wonderful. Can't wait to see you next time for another brunch date!

reviews_data.review_text: The barista was so friendly and had wonderful things to say about their menu. A delightful selection of crafted drinks. The honey cinnamon latte was delicious!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Lily, we’re so glad you stopped by and loved the Honey Cinnamon Latte! Thanks for your kind words about our barista—our team really loves making every visit special.

reviews_data.review_text: Not somewhere to go if you need it to be quiet but a great new shop and not over priced
reviews_data.owner_answer: Jessica, we're so glad you found us and enjoyed your time, food, and drinks! We're thankful to be a sweet hub for the community. For your next visit, our afternoons from Monday through Thursday are often more low-key. We hope you can join us again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: our first time here and we had a great experience! the space was bright and airy with lots of seating. our 8 month old enjoyed the swivel chairs and had lots to look at, including many other families and babies! the drip coffee was fantastic as was the avocado toast and bfast sandwich. We enjoyed chatting with other patrons and you could tell there is a kind and local vibe to this place. we decided to try this place based on the positive reviews and responses from the owner. glad we did, and will be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Becky, We're so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your first visit to Platform Coffee + Kitchen! It's always our mission to serve as a local hub of hospitality, where the community can gather and enjoy not just great coffee and food but also the company of each other. It’s encouraging to know we’re on the right track. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Exceptional friendly service.  Authentic smiles. Delicious tasting coffees.  Made to order.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Manny, for letting us serve you and for highlighting not just our delicious coffee but also our amazing staff—they truly are the real stars behind it all! We're thrilled you enjoyed every aspect of your visit and can’t wait to welcome you back.

reviews_data.review_text: Love the vibe here, and the service, coffee and food was all outstanding!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us, Shelli! Thank you for the wonderful review and for embracing all we have to offer.

reviews_data.review_text:
The vibe was great would've received 5 stars but frappe was not so great unsure if it was actually Caramel like I asked for or flavoring needs work, recipes need a lot of work when it comes to coffee
With that being said everything else was great will be back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit and look forward to having you back. We appreciate your comments on the frappe flavor, and we'll definitely work on making improvements to ensure the best experience all around! We'd love a chance to earn those extra stars in your eyes next time.

reviews_data.review_text: The food was good but we ordered the steak wrap which was advertised as carne asada , so we were surprised to receive ground beef and at the same price. Totally understanding of running low or being out of a product, but I think some transparency on their end would have helped the situation. If I would have known I might have opted for a different item. The coffee and matcha were fine, just not my favorite in the city, but worth trying again for a second opinion.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Faris, Thank you for sharing your experience. It’s important to clarify that we do not offer ground beef at our location, and there are no substitutions of this kind in our menu items. We’re committed to maintaining the highest quality as well as transparency with our offerings. We'd love to have you again to try more items from our menu and have the opportunity to earn those extra stars!

reviews_data.review_text: Had a business meeting there. Just a normal coffee place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Robert, thanks for choosing us for your business meeting and for sharing your thoughts. We always appreciate feedback and hope we can enhance your experience at your next visit.

reviews_data.review_text:
Have to update my review to talk about their INCREDIBLE dinner menu. My boyfriend and I got the steak, potatoes, green beans, and the crème brûlée.

I’ve never had green beans so perfectly cooked (not one was mushy or crunchy—literally every bite was cooked right!), and the crème brûlée has fresh cream and strawberries (and you can see the flecks of vanilla).

I truly believe that Platform’s kitchen is one of the main things that sets it apart from other coffee shops in Charlotte. And, how many restaurants can roast their own coffee and serve it excellently? BRB I will be always here with these new extended hours 🥳

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Noelle. We're thrilled you had a great brunch with us and that parking was easy to find. We can’t wait to have you back for more delicious food and good vibes!

reviews_data.review_text: Best new coffee shop in Charlotte! hands down the best avocado toast and latte I've tried in CLT. And when I tell you the food is 5 stars, is because IT IS!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Daniela! Our avocado toast is a customer favorite, so we're thrilled you loved yours too. Thanks for mentioning that we have great vegetarian options — we strive to create a great experience for all our guests, including our vegetarian friends. We look forward to serving you again soon at Platform Coffee!

reviews_data.review_text: Lovely place. Good was really good!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We take joy in incorporating amazing food options into our hospitality and love creating a memorable experience for every guest. We're so glad to hear you enjoyed your visit!

reviews_data.review_text:
This coffee shop is truly outstanding—spacious, stylish, and filled with a vibrant energy. It’s the kind of place where people comfortably work, relax, or meet with friends, creating a dynamic yet cozy atmosphere.

The interior design is a perfect blend of loft and modern styles, with industrial accents and sleek contemporary touches. Everything feels well-thought-out and harmonious, making it a space you genuinely enjoy being in.

The coffee is exceptional, rich and full of flavor, prepared by friendly and skilled baristas who clearly take pride in their craft. I haven’t tried their breakfast options yet, but they look incredibly tempting—definitely something I’ll come back for.

A must-visit for coffee lovers and anyone who appreciates a great ambiance!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Great to hear you enjoy the ambiance and design at our coffee shop! Our team puts a lot of effort into creating a warm and welcoming space for the community to gather. Every part of our coffee is carefully prepared—from our in-house roasting to the syrups we make ourselves—so you can enjoy your drink to the fullest. We can't wait for you to try our breakfast options on your next visit; we're sure you’ll find them just as tempting as our beverages! Also, we have exciting news to share: we are extending our hours! Now you can come by even later in the day and enjoy special dinner menu items too. See you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
A beacon of light in the boring culinary world of Charlotte
Excellent service excellent food and excellent coffee.
10/10
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, thanks for unlocking such high praise, Local Locksmiths! 🔑✨ We're thrilled to add some excitement to Charlotte's culinary scene. We've got to admit—we really love food. Looking forward to your next visit for more top-notch eats and coffee!

reviews_data.review_text: New favorite coffee shop! This gem is my new go-to. Not only is the coffee amazing (try the three wise men latte), the place so cute and has a lot of seating options! The food is what fully sold me though, the Caesar salad and Brussels sprouts are EVERYTHING. Literally going here again today because I can’t stop thinking about the food. So good 🤩🤩
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Cathy, we're so glad you found us and have been enjoying both our coffee and food! We've got some exciting new menu items launching today—come check them out and let us know what you think!

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee is tasty, good environment to go and get work done or meet with friends. They usually have a pretty good crowd when I’ve been there but there’s parking around the back if needed.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for being with us, Melissa! Our community really helps create a vibrant atmosphere, and we love to see it! Great tip about the parking out back—access is off of State Street.

reviews_data.review_text: Platform is next level across the board. Vibes, food and coffee could not be better. These folks really figured it out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We believe it's our team’s dedication to service and hospitality that really shines through, and we're grateful to be a gathering place for our amazing community. Come again soon, Brandon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Waffles with strawberries -yum!

Only problem here is that it's so popular!! It gets incredibly busy!

review_questions.Recommended dishes: Waffle with Strawberries and Whipped Cream

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Dianne! The waffles are definitely a big hit—so glad you enjoy them! It’s so neat to see the community gathering and enjoying themselves here, even when it gets busy. We appreciate everyone's enthusiasm and look forward to offering you a great experience each time you visit.

reviews_data.review_text:
I visited Platform Coffee & Kitchen last Friday around noon, and while it was pretty busy with a lively background ambiance, I still had a great experience! I ordered a lox bagel, which was delicious, and the matcha was pretty good too.

There are tons of seating options, including spots that are perfect for working, which I really appreciated. I had actually been to this spot before under its previous name, but this was my first time visiting since the rebranding to Platform Coffee. Even with the changes, it’s still just as good as I remember!

Overall, I enjoyed my time there and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for great food, drinks, and a nice place to hang out or work.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming again, Amanda! You might have noticed a few changes, but we're the same owners, so the heart and soul behind our shop remains the same. We've had so much fun working with our chef to bring some amazing food options to you. We're also excited to let you know that we are introducing new menu items today and extending our hours, giving you more time to come and hang out with us.

reviews_data.review_text: it’s a cute place and good vibe! there were lots of people here but not in an overwhelming way. i think people just really like this spot and i can see why! i think a lot of people go here to work, which makes sense. it’s comfortable, good vibe, and has outlets. i got a matcha latte and it was a little sweet for my liking. i’ll just give more instruction next time. also, for in house they served in take away cups which was a bit of a bummer. i’m a sucker for a good mug.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Glad you stopped by, Olivia! Definitely let us know your preferences for your matcha next time—we want it to be just right for you on every visit! We’re also excited to share that we've recently gotten more beautiful mugs, so we're able to offer mugs more often now. Looking forward to serving you the perfect cup in one of them on your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffeeshop in Charlotte.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Anca! Hope to see you back at Platform Coffee + Kitchen soon for another round of your favorites!

reviews_data.review_text: Not sure if there is an off time but it was packed in here. The woman that took my order was nice. All the staff were nice actually. I ordered the peppermint mocha, my taste buds might have been off as it wasn’t my favorite and this is a go to flavor for me. I have a bacon egg and mozzarella cheese croissant and the Brussel sprouts. Both were great. I didn’t like that my food wasn’t super warm, part of that being my fault as I was sitting down at my table and didn’t hear my name called when my order was ready. It was loud in there I could barely think. I’d go back for the Brussel sprouts but might get it Togo based on the amount of people and noise level.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jenna, thank you for visiting and sharing your feedback. We're thrilled that our coffee shop is a vibrant place, which we believe is thanks not only to our amazing coffee and fresh dishes, but also to our incredible staff and the amazing community that hangs out here. Typically, Saturdays are busiest around 9am-12pm, yet we strive for top-notch and efficient service at all times. We're sorry to hear your peppermint mocha didn't hit the spot as expected — we've double-checked our syrup to confirm it is tasting just right. A tip we have for a hotter meal next time, be sure to add your phone number when ordering; this way, you’ll receive a text notification when your food is ready to be picked up. We're glad you enjoyed the Brussels sprouts and hope to see you again soon to try more of what we offer. Thanks again, Jenna!

reviews_data.review_text: Busy place for sure not that many charging areas since there’s like only two outlets each area. Got a coffee which was nice but only issue i had was one of the employees with dark hair and glared at me when waiting for my coffee gave me my chocolate croissant and threw it on the table rather than just handing it to me? Dont know what her problem was but ruined the vibe of the place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for your feedback regarding charging areas. We will be happy to explore ways to accommodate more charging spots for everyone's convenience. We sincerely aim for every interaction at our coffee shop to be warm and welcoming, and we have addressed your experience internally to ensure it doesn't happen again.

reviews_data.review_text:
Driving up to the coffee shop,  I was able little shocked.  It has a very industrial exterior. There was both a parking lot and street parking available. I did like the abundance of windows which allowed a lot of natural light into the building.
Inside, there is ample seating as you would expect for a shop in an industrial building. Yet, I did like the variety seating options from basic 2 seater tables to cushioned seating. The varying seating options was all on one side opposite the coffee roasting operation. While there was a shortage of outlets on the coffe roasting side, the other side was cozy with outlets along the bench seating.
Now, they offered basic coffee and tea. Yet, they also had speciality drinks and seasonal creations. I got their seasonal espresso with hints of orange and cranberry. It was different but in a good way. I also got there cinnamon roll. The roll was pretty good but the icing was a bit much. Luckily, my wife got their blueberry muffin and preferred my roll. So, I gladly switched with her. I would try it again if I were in the area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for stopping by! We're so glad you enjoyed the space and hope to see you again soon. We have a variety of delicious breakfast and lunch options that we think you'll really love exploring on your next visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Just great. The food was tasty. They all have a great positive Spirit.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, William! It’s our joy to serve wholeheartedly and create a positive experience. We’re so glad you enjoyed your visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Extremely busy coffee shop, but a great opportunity to try a clearly poppin place! I cam on a Saturday morning and man this place was packed! The ambiance is warehouse chic, and there is also a great courtyard area if it gets too full inside. I had a flat white, which arrived quickly with friendly service. Quality coffee and great presentation!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so glad you stopped in! Saturdays are always full of energy, and we're thrilled to provide quality coffee and quick, friendly service to our amazing customers. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: The B.E.C. here is as legit as I ever had in Brooklyn. Pretty hard to believe but it’s that’s good. Coffee is delicious and service is great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Andrew, this made our day! Coming from someone whose taste buds have probably enjoyed the best of New York, that’s the ultimate compliment. We're thrilled our B.E.C. lives up to the Brooklyn standard! Hope to see you back soon for more.

reviews_data.review_text: It's more than just a coffee shop. Located at The Union at Station West. Was surprised to see that there was plenty of parking in their parking area as well as side street parking even though I arrived during peak lunch time. Walking up the shop, you are immediately greeted with christmas decorations and vibes! Upon entering, I was also surprised by how spacious they were and ample seating options! There are lots of tables to choose from, including 2 couch seating options. Christmas decorations everywhere and such a cozy vibe. I opted for their vanilla latte, which was delicious! Just the right amount of flavoring. It was not too sweet and had the perfect blend of espresso and vanilla. I decided to order their West Charlotte Salad with chicken! For the price, you get a very generous salad! It was HUGE! Just enough to eat half and get full and the other half for dinner or lunch the next day. The greens were all super fresh, with no wilted lettuce anywhere. The vegetables all paired perfectly with the feta cheese & added chicken. It was all very tasteful and tasted very green if that made sense (haha!). I also ordered their Cajun fries, OMG! They were crispy and very warm and delicious! The best fries are hands down. You can tell they take pride in preparing the food as well as the presentation. It all goes a long way. Everyone was super friendly and efficient. They have a restroom and a family restroom as well and 2 high chairs in case they are needed.  I completely loved this place and see myself returning quite a bit during lunchtime to try other things off their menu.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to share such a thoughtful and detailed review! We had so much fun decorating for the Christmas season—it really does create such a warm and festive atmosphere. We're so glad you loved your food choices; those are definitely favorites around here, but honestly, everything on the menu is a gem. Our menu is chef-inspired and carefully prepared, and we’re thrilled you could taste the difference. Plus, all our syrups, like the one in your vanilla latte, are made in-house. Please come again soon for more dishes and drinks!

reviews_data.review_text: We got a nice pour-over. The outside is also very good for families with children.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much! We’re happy you had a great time. The outdoor space—with the fire pit and corn hole—really do make it a fun spot for families. Can’t wait to have you back!

reviews_data.review_text: Tasty matcha
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Carol! So glad you loved the matcha—did you have it regular or the winter special Candy Cane Matcha version?

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing coffee, food, and atmosphere! The menu is diverse which offers options to everyone.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Alison! We’re so glad you loved the menu—we’re really excited about what we get to offer. Having a full kitchen means we can go beyond the usual coffee shop bites, with everything from brunch to lunch and more. Hope to see you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Favorite breakfast food in Charlotte. LOVE the vibe. Coffee is freakin' fantastic. Get a cortado w a dash of caramel. Heaven.
reviews_data.owner_answer: It's always amazing to see you, Virginia! We’re all about serving up great breakfast and coffee (and more!) so it’s awesome to hear we’re hitting the mark. That cortado with our house-made caramel is a favorite!

reviews_data.review_text: I visited one morning during the week. Beautiful space, and pretty busy — but I was able to find a small table to sit with my ten-month old to enjoy an iced coffee and breakfast sandwich. One of the employees brought me high-chair upon request. Parking is a bit tight, but worth working around for what they serve. Sometimes there’s a clear favorite between the coffee and food; but here, both are so excellent, it’s hard to decide which offering I liked more! 10/10 would recommend Platform Coffee + Kitchen and would like to come back soon :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much, Ella! We’re so glad you and your little one had a great visit. Our team works hard to make sure both the food and coffee are something special—everything’s made fresh to order, and our coffee is roasted right here in-house. Hearing that you loved both makes our day! We can’t wait to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I have yet to try the food but the coffee was great and this is a really clean establishment with great service.

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words! We’re thrilled you enjoyed the coffee and had a great visit. We’d love for you to come back and explore our food menu next time—your taste buds are in for a treat!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place! The food is delicious, coffee is great, and the staff are top notch!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey John, this just made our day! Our team is the heart and soul of what we do, and hearing they made such an impression means everything. We’ll be sure to share this with them—it’ll definitely bring some smiles. See you again soon for more delicious food and coffee! 🚂☕🍴

reviews_data.review_text: My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte serves a premium roast. The iced cold brew with lavender (thank you for always having lavender simple syrup) is always incredibly delicious. Their croissants are next level, especially when paired with the breakfast sandwich. For something so simple, it’s absolutely tasty. Service is always friendly and quick!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Chase, wow—thank you so much for the love! Lavender cold brew, croissants, and breakfast sandwiches—sounds like you’ve got the ultimate lineup. 😊 And your kind words about our service? That’s exactly what we're aiming for. Can’t wait to see you back soon! ☕🥐

reviews_data.review_text: I really enjoyed the drink and the cinnamon roll! There were a lot of tables to sit at so it was a nice place to hang out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Alyssa, thanks so much for hanging out with us! You had a winning combo with those food + drink choices!

reviews_data.review_text: really pretty place that makes super good lattes, I recommend getting the breakfast sandwich, the prices are quite high I paid almost $19 (not counting tip) but it’s definitely worth a visit! I tried the chocolate croissant also but it was extremely dry and quite stale which was a bit disappointing.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Rawan, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback! We’re so glad you enjoyed the lattes, our top-selling breakfast sandwich, as well as a croissant—those are definitely some of our favorites too. 😊 We do our best to price items to reflect not only the quality of ingredients but the made-to-order menu items, but we understand your perspective and appreciate the honesty. As for the chocolate croissant, we’re so sorry it didn’t hit the mark—we’ll look into this to make sure it’s up to our usual standards. Thanks again for visiting, and we hope to see you back soon! ✨

reviews_data.review_text: If you remember 8 and Sand in south end, this recreates that experience and builds on it with unique coffee options. Really great walk in and get your food speed. Highly recommend.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kory, thank you for your thoughtful review and sweet compliments. It means a lot to hear that we’re creating a space worth recommending. Keep coming back! ☕✨

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing spot and cool staff
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Viktor! We’re so happy you had a great experience. Our team’s heart for serving others is what makes this place special!

reviews_data.review_text:
Enjoyed several visits to this cute coffee shop last time we were in Charlotte. The people and service went above and beyond, helped us with the questions we had and made us feel welcome. I really appreciate that they are inclusive to people with food intolerances and can highly recommend the turkey sandwich with gluten free bread substitute, as well as the porridge and the West Charlotte salad (just ask for no breadcrumbs). For drinks we tried the Moonlight and Honey cinnamon Latte, the maple bourbon (one of their seasonal drinks) and the Cortado. Everything we tried was well made and delicious!

We will be back next time we are in town!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow, Susannah, this absolutely made our day! We’re so glad you felt the care and hospitality we aim to share with everyone who visits. It’s amazing to hear how much you enjoyed both the food and drinks—those intentional details like gluten-free options and seasonal specials are a big part of what we love offering. We can’t wait to welcome you back next time you’re in Charlotte!

reviews_data.review_text: Very good coffee, with a great atmosphere.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate your kind words! We’re all about great coffee and creating a welcoming space, so your feedback means a lot to us.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a beautiful place just to hangout or do some work! The atmosphere is welcoming and there’s so much seating. The coffee is great and the food was amazing. I would definitely recommend getting the turkey sandwich. The melted mozzarella on it was delicious.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Cristy! We’re so glad you felt the welcoming heart of hospitality here—that’s what we’re all about! Amazing food options paired with great coffee are what make us stand out, and that turkey sandwich with the melted mozzarella is definitely a fan favorite. See you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffee in Charlotte hands down.
reviews_data.owner_answer: This made our day! So glad you’re loving the iced latte and breakfast burrito—can’t wait to see you back again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing spot for both breakfast and lunch. Lattes are unsurpassed, and I love the dark roast drip-- so rich, aromatic, and smooth.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Appreciate the love, Mariam! Breakfast or lunch, we’ve got you covered—and so glad you’re loving our dark roast drip. See you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice place and service. But I'm sorry, your coffee is the same garbage like everywhere in this city.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Dmitry,

Thanks for the shout-out on our service and atmosphere! Sorry to hear the coffee didn't meet your expectations. We’d love to have you back and get the chance to help you find a coffee—or non-coffee beverage—that you truly enjoy. Please come back in and let us know your preferences. We’re confident we can find something that hits the spot! We'd love the opportunity to turn those stars around!

Looking forward to welcoming you back!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped by Platform Coffee + Kitchen based on the reviews and it was amazing!  We came by on a Saturday when they were very busy and waited 30 minutes just to order our food.  While waiting in line, they had someone come around and give out free samples of their house chai latte which tasted great.  We ordered the Conductor Pumpkin Spice Latte, Avocado Toast, Bagel with Egg, Sausage & Cheese and Brussel Sprouts.  It did take about 20 minutes to get our food due to being busy but we did not mind at all.  The coffee was great and the food was amazing.  My wife said it is the best Avocado Toast she's ever had!  Everyone was so friendly and the atmosphere was awesome!  We loved it so much we came back 3 days later with family and it was once again amazing!  Thank you Platform Coffee + Kitchen for a great experience!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Brandon! We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed your visits and that our team’s hospitality made you feel welcome, even when things were extra busy. We agree with your wife—our Avocado Toast is truly a fan favorite! We look forward to seeing you again soon and appreciate your continued support!

reviews_data.review_text: The coffee shop had delicious lattes, but they were a bit overpriced for the size.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Hudson, thank you for stopping by! We're so glad you enjoyed our delicious lattes. We take great pride in offering exceptional quality, with our own in-house roasted coffee beans and syrups made from scratch to ensure each cup is truly special. Our team works hard to create both an inviting space and an excellent product. We hope to welcome you back soon and hope you'll find even more to love in all we offer!

reviews_data.review_text: Excellent coffee, excellent food! Really cool place to hang out. Views are not great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for visiting, James! We’re really happy to hear you enjoyed the food and coffee. It’s great to know that your time with us was a good one. Can’t wait to have you back for more!

reviews_data.review_text: The avocado toast and coffee we had were both delicious!! We'll definitely be back. There's lots of seating inside and outside.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Kyle! We’re so glad you enjoyed the coffee and avocado toast! It’s always great to hear when our favorites hit the spot. We can’t wait to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Loved this coffee shop. It got crowded and loud during peak but was quiet through the rest of the day. I was able to sit near a plug but there are only so many in a certain area. I also had the best avocado toast and pumpkin muffin.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're glad you enjoyed the avocado toast and pumpkin muffin—they're some of our favorites too! Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Awesome experience! Not only the coffee is of top quality, also the burger and the wrap is super tasty. Highly recommend to get some food as well. Have been there more than 1 time.
Great service, nice personnel, good music. Defintely 5 star. I even met the manager in person, friendly guy.
Check it yourself.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Peter! We’re delighted to hear you had an awesome experience and enjoyed both the coffee and food. It means a lot to us that you’ve visited multiple times and found our service, music, and team to be top-notch. We truly value connecting with our customers, so it’s fantastic that you had the chance to meet our manager. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I recently visited this coffee shop and was thoroughly impressed. The avocado sandwich was absolutely unique and delicious—definitely something you won’t find anywhere else. The atmosphere was just "wow," with a cozy and inviting vibe that made it a perfect spot to relax. The staff were incredibly kind and attentive, making the whole experience even better. I highly recommend stopping by if you’re in the area!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by, Dina! We're so glad to hear how much you enjoyed our avocado toast and that the atmosphere of the shop left such a great impression. Our team works hard to create a welcoming environment with top-notch service and it’s rewarding to know it made your experience even better. We look forward to welcoming you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Probably my favorite coffee shop. I first stopped in because I was headed toward The Batchmaker for a little treat, and then remembered that a ceramics artist BLANK ceramics, I follow, made cups for the shop. So I went in and it’s real hip, yet welcoming. Great lighting, good seating, friendly staff. I tried the moonlight latte and it was THE BEST LATTE I’ve ever had, I’m old, I’ve been to a gazillion coffee spots, and something about the UNIQUE ube nutty oat milk, perfect shot ratio, was so good. I kid you not people, dreams are made of this latte.
I am devastated that it is gone because it was a summer drink. 😩😩😩😩 but I’m excited for whatever the fall brings 🫶🏼 oh, try the food. Avocado toast, Tasty. Bacon, scrambled egg, cheese croissant, very very yum.
Hope you get the idea, I’m a fan 😂
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Patti! We are thrilled to hear that Platform is one of your favorite spots! It’s always a pleasure to see customers connect with the experience our amazing team puts out, from the atmosphere to the food and, of course, the coffee. We’re especially proud to feature Blank's beautiful, hand-crafted mugs—it's wonderful that her artistry brought you through our doors!

We’re so glad you enjoyed the Moonlight Latte - it's a favorite for sure! We're introducing our Autumn drink specials today and can't wait for you to come taste those! We also love that you discovered we’re a hot spot for amazing food! Your kind words really make our day, and we can’t wait to welcome you back soon. P.S. Thanks for sharing these beautiful pictures.

reviews_data.review_text: nice place. perfect work space
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're thrilled that you enjoyed our food and service and found it to be the perfect work environment. Also, thanks for sharing your great photos! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Food was actually much better than what i expected from a nicer place for coffee. I had a steak burrito from the lunch menu tjat was very flavorful, they said spicy, I didn't notice much spice but my husband did so that is subjective. He had a scrambled eggs in croissant with sausage and mozzarella, flavors complimented each other, it was nicely cooked and croissant was devine. Service is good, we quickly got coffee and our food shortly after, no complaints there. When it comes to coffee this place exceeded my expectations for sure, I am very particular about my coffee and i don't use any flavoring, I was surprised how good regular iced late tastes here. Their espresso machine must have great pressure and does not burn the coffee at all. Overall delicious. Ambiance is different than in other coffee shops i have been, place has modern industrial design and seating is nicely soaced out. Overall If i was in Charlotte I would come back.

P.S. My ratings are based on whether I believe I could make a better or healthier version at home. If food/drinks/service impress me, I'll be happy to come back. If not the stars reflect that.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your detailed experience! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed both the food and coffee—especially as someone who's particular about your coffee. It's always great to know when we exceed expectations in that department! We take pride in roasting our own coffee in-house, which we believe is a big part of why the espresso flavor stands out without any burnt taste. It's a process we’re passionate about, and we’re glad it contributed to your enjoyment! If you'd like to enjoy our coffee at home, we do sell our beans online so you can continue to experience that same quality wherever you are. <https://platformcoffee.com/collections/coffee>

We can’t wait to welcome you back! Thanks again for the thoughtful review, Irina!

reviews_data.review_text: Delicious coffee and even nicer staff!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Rebecca! We're so glad to hear you enjoyed the coffee and felt the kind hospitality from our team. Creating a warm and inviting environment is what we're all about, and we’re excited to continue sharing that with you each time you visit.

reviews_data.review_text:
I came here straight from a red-eye flight for some caffeine. The iced mocha I had was so good, I got another. They were out of the chocolate croissant, so I had the butter one. The flavor was great, and they heated it up for me, but it was chewier than I'd expect for a gourmet (or even Costco) croissant.

The spot has a hip & modern vibe, but is comfortable. It looks like a former commercial/industrial space with nice brick work and plenty of plants inside.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Garnet,
Thank you for making Platform Coffee a part of your day! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Providing a welcoming space and exceptional coffee is what we strive for each day.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Platform is a nice place with a lot of offerings but it’s all counter service so there is not much to impress on service. The atmosphere is primarily sub-40s meeting up for business or social. The entire interior consists of all hard surfaces so it’s pretty noisy and reverberating inside!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi Jeff,
Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts! We’re glad you enjoyed our offerings. At Platform, we truly take pride in providing quality drink and food options. We also strive to create a welcoming environment for everyone, and we understand that noise can be a concern. We’re currently looking into ways to enhance the acoustics in our space to make it more comfortable for all our guests. Thanks again for your input, and we hope to see you back at Platform soon!

reviews_data.review_text: First time visiting yesterday, and definitely coming back. It’s now one of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte. The coffee is delicious, and they have the best avocado toast, 10/10
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Daniella! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit and that we've made it to your list of favorite coffee shops in Charlotte! Hearing that you loved the coffee and our avocado toast makes our day. We're looking forward to welcoming you back for many more visits!

reviews_data.review_text: One of the best coffee shops, if not the best, in Charlotte! From the service to the cleanliness and decoration to the coffee. Thank you Platform Coffee for proving a great space!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Kate! We’re incredibly honored by your kind words. It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed every aspect of your visit. Creating a great space for our guests is what we strive for every day, and knowing we’ve succeeded makes us so happy. We can’t wait to welcome you back for more memorable experiences!

reviews_data.review_text: Terrible parking. Looked like long lines.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi BC, we appreciate you sharing your thoughts! We're sorry to hear that the parking and potential wait times were a concern for you. We understand that parking can sometimes be a bit tricky, but we want to let you know that there's plenty of additional parking on the other side of the building. You can enter off of State Street and easily walk through the plaza to reach us. Our space is a vibrant hub, and we’d love for you to experience what so many others enjoy. We hope you'll give us a try and see what the buzz is all about!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place good atmosphere good coffee my cold brew was made to perfection loved the house made syrup on point with sweetness and milk no adjustments needed recommend and will return
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Sara, thank you for your kind words. We’re so glad you enjoyed your time with us! Our goal is to ensure that our drinks and food are always on point and we believe, along with that, the welcoming atmosphere our staff creates at Platform Coffee + Kitchen is what truly sets us apart. We’re thrilled that you felt the love and care we put into making your experience special.

Thank you for visiting, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: It’s a cute place. Nice to work and have a cup of coffee, but cow milk when I asked for oat milk is diabolical.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi MiQuita,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re thrilled that you enjoyed the atmosphere and found our shop a good spot to work. We sincerely apologize for the mix-up with your milk order. Ensuring our customers get exactly what they ask for is very important to us, and we regret that this didn’t happen during your visit. We take your comments seriously and will work to ensure this doesn't happen again.

We hope you were able to notify the staff right away so they could correct it on the spot. We’d love the chance to serve you again soon and make your next visit even better.

reviews_data.review_text: Love the atmosphere. Food is a lil pricey for what it is, but the atmosphere and service make it worth coming back to.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kevin, we’re so glad you enjoyed your experience at Platform Coffee + Kitchen! We strive to source quality ingredients in our dishes as well as make everything in house. Our goal is to provide not just great food, but also the highest level of hospitality and service, as our staff love to serve with a welcoming heart. We're thrilled that you anticipate coming again and look forward to seeing you soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
Arrived for coffee & breakfast…then stayed for lunch!

Breakfast: Buttermilk Waffle + Bananas + Coffee (Dark Roast was deliciousssss)

Lunch: Steak Wrap!
(Kudos to those in the kitchen!)

Excellent Customer Service. Shouts to those working the counter!

Very nice atmosphere if you WFH.

Plenty of space, seating (Inside & Outside)

Pet Friendly

FREE WI-FI

10/10 highly would recommend!

review_questions.Recommended dishes: Avocado Toast, Waffle with Strawberries and Whipped Cream, Breakfast Burrito, Fruit Bowl
review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer:
Michael, we’re glad you felt the hospitality of our staff. We love serving our customers from the heart. And yes, we love the food and beverage we serve and want to keep it consistently well-produced but also keeping it fresh and creative. 

We hope to host you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: My favorite local coffee shop in Charlotte! The coffee and food are as exceptional as their service. The baristas are so friendly and are always so helpful and accomodating. It is always clean and comfortable, with ample indoor and outdoor seating. Their seasonal drinks are amazing, they always have really great options for those who don't drink traditional coffee drinks.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Sheena, we love hosting! Thank you for sharing about your experience at Platform Coffee. Truly, our goal is to provide exceptional hospitality, beverages and food!

reviews_data.review_text:
The drink looked nice but the matcha was overpowered by the milk. $7 matcha (including tip) is expensive for just milk.
Customer service was okay. Barista made my drink and talked to her coworker for a while before handing it to me.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Jasmine, 

Thank you for the feedback! We aspire to show the utmost hospitality to our guests. We are sorry you had that experience with our baristas. We will be sure to discuss this internally and address it so it doesn't happen again.

We do love the product we produce here but first and foremost want our guests to love their experience including the beverage and food they choose to enjoy here at Platform Coffee. 

We would appreciate the opportunity to serve you another drink of your choice and refund you your $7 when you come back to visit us.

reviews_data.review_text: I am truly impressed with this establishment. The ambience is so peaceful and relaxing yet inviting so you want to just stay here! This is my first time here and I tried the midnight latte (primarily because of the ube) and a bacon, egg, and cheese croissant which was HUGE! Julianna took my order and talked to me as if she was genuinely interested in me as a person. She asked how I learned of them and explained a few things to me about their menu options. She is so kind and welcoming! All of the employees actually SMILE which makes this such a happy place. AND it is super clean. I will definitely be back again soon to enjoy this space!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Michelle, Thank you for your fantastic review! We’re thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Julianna and our entire team strive to create a warm and welcoming environment, and it's wonderful to hear that their hospitality made your experience special. We’re glad you loved the moonlight latte and our breakfast croissant sandwich. Your feedback truly uplifts our team and reinforces our commitment to excellent service. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great morning meeting place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Kevin! We're glad to hear that you find our coffee shop a great place for morning meetings. Your support means a lot to us, and we look forward to serving you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee, Great customer service
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Pat! Thank you for your kind review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our coffee, customer service, and atmosphere. It's always our goal to provide a top-notch experience for our guests, and your feedback means a lot to us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
The cute interior and tempting brunch menu caught our eye, so we decided to drop in on a whim. We ordered the Make Your Own Bagel, Yogurt Bowl, and Midnight Latte. My friend was all over the bagel, and the Midnight latte was so good!! Mixed well espresso with ube flavor.

I've got a strawberry allergy, so I asked them to skip the strawberries in the yogurt bowl. They literally just left them out without adding anything else, so I ended up with plain yogurt and oatmeal. The oatmeal was decent though, maybe homemade with some nuts mixed in.

Staff was friendly and the space was nice, but it would've been great if they'd shown a bit more creativity with the strawberry substitution.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Selina! Thank you for your review and 5-Stars! Next time you're in we would love to offer you a complimentary Yogurt Bowl with your choice of fruit. Hope to see you soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I love the atmosphere at Platform Coffee. Not only is the place spacious, but it's well decorated and CLEAN! Lastly, the staff are kind and very professional.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate your thoughtful review, Wynta! It means a lot to us that you noticed the care we put into making Platform Coffee an inviting space. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we're delighted that it made your visit memorable. Can't wait to have you back!

reviews_data.review_text: It was definitely a great experience at this coffee shop and their Iced Ube latte was amazing!! The ambiance was cozy and comfortable. The baristas were friendly and nice. I will definitely be back to work remotely on my laptop.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so happy you enjoyed your experience with us, Mery! We're thrilled you loved our ube latte. "The Moonlight" is certainly a customer favorite! Our baristas enjoyed serving you, and we can’t wait to have you back to work remotely with us again!

reviews_data.review_text: So amazing !
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review!

reviews_data.review_text:
I recently visited this coffee shop, and I can't say enough good things about it! The atmosphere is simply amazing—cozy, inviting, and perfect for relaxing or getting some work done.

I tried the avocado toast and the oatmeal latte, and both were out of this world. The avocado toast was fresh and perfectly seasoned, while the oatmeal latte was the best I've ever had—creamy, flavorful, and just the right amount of sweetness.

The service was top-notch, with friendly and attentive staff who made me feel right at home. It's a fantastic place to hang out, enjoy some delicious food, and drink some of the best coffee around. Highly recommend checking it out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Chris, your kind and generous review is so appreciated! Come and hang with us any time!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place. Such a great vibe with delicious coffee and  great menu. Turkey sandwich was absolutely fantastic. Love the people here too. Even though it's a bit far for me, I will come often!
reviews_data.owner_answer: The turkey sandwich is a huge hit! We are glad you loved it. Thank you for your kind review and 5-Stars!

reviews_data.review_text: the best coffee we have ever had!
reviews_data.owner_answer: What a compliment, thank you!

reviews_data.review_text: best coffee i’ve ever had!!!! get the iced mocha you won’t regret it lol
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the 5-Star review and kind comment!

reviews_data.review_text:
Coffee at Station West is one of the best coffee shops/work spaces/hangouts in Uptown Charlotte! The drinks are absolutely divine. Every season they create specialty caffeinated beverages that are out of this world. The best is the Ube latte that is a specialty drink of the summer. But it's not just about the coffee; their food selection is equally impressive. From savory sandwiches to delectable pastries, every bite is a delight. Some of the best casual food in Charlotte. I highly suggest the avocado toast- they make such a simple dish a culinary masterpiece.

What sets this place apart, though, is its ambiance. With cozy nooks and ample workspace, it's the perfect spot to hunker down and get some work done. The atmosphere is buzzing yet relaxed, making it equally suitable for a solo brainstorming session or a casual catch-up with friends.

The staff deserves a special mention as well. Friendly, attentive, and passionate about their craft, they elevate the experience to another level.

Whether you're a coffee aficionado, a foodie, or just someone in search of a welcoming environment to spend some time, this coffee shop ticks all the boxes. Five stars all the way!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Wow, what a generous and kind review, thank you so much! Our customers are why we do what we do and reviews like this mean a tremendous amount to all of us here at the coffee shop. 
Thank you, Cassandra!

reviews_data.review_text: Went to this place to meet up with a friend and talk! Such a beautiful and relaxing place. Coffee and matcha were delicious and the porridge is always tasty.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for you review and 5-Stars, Anna!

reviews_data.review_text:
Definitely my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte!

Love the food and vibe! The people are so friendly! The food , sweets and drinks are so delicious!

reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic food. Very friendly staff and a great atmosphere.

reviews_data.review_text: Clean, a vibe,  and staff are super sweet especially Langdon ☺️  The coffee is super good as well!  Plenty of seating options.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great coffee shop to visit on our road trip. We went twice! The waffles are amazing and so it the service.

reviews_data.review_text: I love this place. They do the little things well—always friendly staff, clean and spacious dining area, and fun drinks. We’ve been a couple times, but decided to come and try the Spring seasonals. My Strawberry cold foam Matcha Latte was exceptional, and my gf loved her raspberry white mocha as well. There are lots of places to sit and charge if needed, which makes it even better. Just wish they were open Sundays to take more of our money!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind review, Jordan! The strawberry cold foam is a favorite among the staff too :)

reviews_data.review_text: Hidden coffee shop, you wouldn’t know from the outside but it is indeed open. Richly flavored coffee and friendly service. Coffee takes a minute but is worth it. Pastries are fresh and well presented.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review, glad you think our coffee is worth it!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is MAGICAL! My family and I live around the corner and we absolutely love coming here. The baristas know us by name and what we typically order (even though I change up my order every time) and we're always greeted with a smile. The food is delicious and I love the seasonal drinks they come up with. The vibe is so nice and our toddler loves to go because it is also kid-friendly. I cannot recommend this place enough, and honestly, didn't want to because I'm selfish and wanna keep it from getting too crowded :) By far the best coffee shop in Charlotte!

reviews_data.review_text: Stopped in this morning for breakfast & a latte; so glad I did!! reviews_data.review_text: Big time fan of the folks at Station West Coffee! Juliana makes the best latte around and Langdon has helped us develop a special brew for the coffee service at our church that people go crazy for. These guys do coffee and hospitality right! Can't recommend them enough!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Alex, thank you for this kind review!

reviews_data.review_text:
Just popped into Coffee at Station West, and honestly, I've never been so happy to discover a new coffee shop.

The baristas here are on another level of energy and happiness - like genuinely loving what they do there. Like if caffeine were a person, it wouldI went for an almond milk latte, which was nothing short of perfectly crafted, and the chocolate croissant was a game-changer; definitely in my top five of all time.

The atmosphere is EXACTLY what you need for a productive day out of the office or a relaxed reading sesh. It's got this blend of cool music and a welcoming vibe that just works.

Plus, the space is designed in such a way that you won't struggle to find a good spot to hunker down, whether you're diving into work or just catching up with someone.

In terms of parking - it's surprisingly easy, which is a rare find for being only 5 mins outside the city.

I haven't been on the weekend yet to see how busy it is, but I can honestly see Coffee at Station West becoming my new go-to weekday coffee spot. Definitely worth checking out.

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.review_text: This was one of my top finds this past year.  I love it here.  The food, ambiance and people in general are always great.  It has a great vibe here and despite living in fort mill I make the drive just to come here!

reviews_data.review_text:
The breakfast sandwich was honestly a bit of a letdown. We ordered it with scrambled egg, bacon, and american cheese on what was supposed to be sourdough--but we're pretty sure it was multigrain. There were oats on the crust, it tasted and looked like the kind of sandwich bread you'd buy at the grocery store. Nothing wrong with that, but for $14, we were hoping for something a little better.

Also, just a heads-up: the menu says the sandwich is $12, but there's an extra unadvertised $2 charge to add egg. Yes, egg--on a breakfast sandwich. We didn't ask for extra or anything. I asked about the upcharge after noticing the sandwich showing $14.00 on the receipt, and the employee mentioned that staff have brought it up with management multiple times, but nothing's changed. Even more frustrating: if you order the same sandwich online, there's no $2 upcharge.

We'll still support this place because the coffee and biscuits are good, but we'll probably pass on the other food from now on.

Platform Coffee is not for the community. They've chosen to capitalize on the current economic crisis by levying a TWO-DOLLAR surcharge on all egg dishes. This is absurd, considering that right now, an entire dozen of eggs (that's 12 eggs, people) costs only about $4.30 right down the road at the nearest Harris Teeter. And that's assuming that PC doesn't purchase their eggs wholesale at an even lower price. 12 eggs are $4.30, or roughly 40 cents each, but Platform Coffee wants to charge you $2.00 for an egg, citing "the current egg shortage." This is nothing short of extortionate. Perhaps a 50-cent surcharge could be understood, but $2 is blatantly greedy, and such a distasteful business practice leaves a bad taste in my mouth, as does their mediocre coffee.

Even when this current egg shortage ends, I'll still stay away from Platform Coffee, because I know these are/were their business ethics during a time of community crisis. Not Just Coffee is only a little further down the road on Jay Street. They serve up a better latte and are actually good neighbors in the West Charlotte community.
Very good coffee and loved the burger for lunch. I come here to work and hang out. Highly recommend if you want a cool coffe shop to hang out at. Outdoor seating, great location, good coffee!

reviews_data.owner_answer: We're all about good experiences, great food, and making every visit memorable — so this kind of feedback really makes our day.

reviews_data.review_text:
My sister and I had the egg biscuit, waffle, and coffee. I thought the food was alright but my sister thought it was all awful. I had a coffee with sugar free syrup and it was the worst I've ever tasted. The atmosphere also felt very pretentious.

I went to school in this area and am sad to see cutesy businesses like this one and soulless apartment complexes pushing out the people who used to live here. Gentrification is not a crime but its not victimless either.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We’re truly sorry your experience didn’t reflect the heart behind what we do, as we aim to serve this neighborhood with love, hospitality, and excellence. We hear you and are grateful for the chance to keep learning and growing.

reviews_data.review_text: I’m visiting from out of town, and one of my favorite Youtubers lives in Charlotte and talked about this place. It certainly exceeded all expectations!
