reviews_data.review_text: I love the coffee, people and working environment here! They are so welcoming, and I love that I can bring my sweet puppy
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Emily! We love the pups! Thank you for supporting our business!

reviews_data.review_text: Love the coffee and the atmosphere! Meet Jaz (one of the baristas) and she was so kind and always remembers my order!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Justin! Thank you for your five star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee at Station West is my favorite spot to grab a coffee. The staff is awesome and always super friendly. Their nitro cold brew is excellent.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Eric! We're honored we get to be part of your day! Thank you for your positive review!

reviews_data.review_text: The coffee and the baristas are amazing. This is my favorite coffee place in Charlotte. Hot and cold Carmel lattes are delicious. My husband gets a nitro cold brew and it comes with a coffee ice cube. He is super picky when it comes to coffee and he loves this place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Lindsay! That's high praise! Thank you for choosing us as your favorite!

reviews_data.review_text: Friendliest staff I’ve ever met. Consistently great over the two years we’ve been visiting (almost daily). Can’t recommend enough
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! Thank you Travis for your review!

reviews_data.review_text: I love the vibe in this coffee shop. The baristas are great. My whole family and loves to go, even the dog! Their coffee is yummy and the hot chocolate is amazing.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Katy! We love seeing you! Thank you for supporting our business!

reviews_data.review_text: Cappuccino was SO GOOD!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Savannah! Thanks for your review, we're glad you loved the cappuccino!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is the best! We love the staff here who always greet us with a smile and go above and beyond with service. I’m always looking forward to the seasonal drinks and they have the BEST sticky bun.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is like our second home. reviews_data.review_text: Love it here!! Great space and service 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Super nice employees, incredible, looking espresso, machine, and fun to be able to get a waffle! The coffee was great, and the waffle would have been better if they put the chocolate chips inside, but otherwise, it was good too. Would definitely recommend!

reviews_data.review_text: best coffee in charlotte!!

reviews_data.review_text: The atmosphere, the food, and the baristas are all excellent. I had the avocado toast with my favorite mocha breve.

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffee shop in Charlotte with the best people in Charlotte! Coffee is amazing and the space is perfect for reading, relaxing, or working. Lang might be the nicest human on Earth and is always a rey of sunshine whenever I come in

reviews_data.review_text: We are from out of town visiting and stopped in. This was an awesome atmosphere and my drink was perfect.  A special thank you to Langdon for his warm welcome and great customer service!  Thank you for making us feel welcome!

reviews_data.review_text: best coffee in charlotte, hands down

reviews_data.review_text: Must stop coffee shop in Charlotte! Highly recommend for great barista customer service and delicious coffee!

reviews_data.review_text: Loved the vibe at Station West!  The avocado toast is delightful!  Coffee is excellent too!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Mike! Our avocado toast is definitely a hit! Thank you for stopping by and for your five star review!

reviews_data.review_text:
Here's the dealio. My wife and I were visiting a friend in NC and we stopped by for some coffee. We sipped, chatted, and relaxed for a couple hours. Near the end of our time, a photographer was doing a photo shoot for a few yet-to-be released food menu items and they let us try them all afterwards! Delicious.
Good coffee, great atmosphere and better service. 👍🏻
Also, met the owner and his wife!
10/10 would meet again 🫡

reviews_data.review_text: STELLAR PLACE! Phenomenal coffee, better than CFA customer service, and just a beautiful space to sit with friends or work! Great natural lighting, they roast their own beans (well) and are just a top tier place! Can’t recommend enough!

reviews_data.review_text: First time here and this place is my new favorite!! Coffee is amazing and so is the staff!

reviews_data.review_text: this coffee shop is perfect for a coffee date 🩷 the baristas are inviting and make some really good coffee! the interior is cute and super cozy. i recommend going! ask for elliot if you want a beautiful latte :)

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee at Station West is home! I love starting my day here when I can, and it’s one of the first places I bring friends and family visiting from out of town.  The cozy atmosphere, friendly staff, and expertly brewed coffee make it my go-to spot.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey McKenzie! Thank you for making us your go-to spot, we don't take it lightly!

reviews_data.review_text:
It’s no Waffle House but it’s pretty good.
Great staff!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Lucas! Thank you for your five star review! And P.S. We'd be happy to do a taste comparison with Waffle House, we can take it ;)

reviews_data.review_text: This place must be good the cops never leave to do their job. Especially Joe, Lang, Jaz, Juliana, Elliot, and Sophia.

reviews_data.review_text: Such good coffee and a great space!

reviews_data.review_text: 5 stars all around! We visited there from out of town and the staff were so friendly and helpful! We loved the coffee and my kiddos loved the smoothies! We especially loved the atmosphere and location with the outdoor area! Beautiful and accommodating for my toddlers!

reviews_data.review_text:

Don't forget the barista. Langdon was the most welcoming and friendly individual you could meet! So lovely!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place, good vibes and cute decor. The staff is awesome(Esther in particular!). I will be back!

reviews_data.review_text: This is a wholesome space, a place of peace and hospitality. By chance or fate I have met the most quality people here, and formed the fondest memories. reviews_data.review_text: One of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte!  The staff is incredible and the food & drinks are top notch.  Hightly recommend!

reviews_data.review_text: I’m a regular here and love all the staff. They really care about all the people they serve and go out of their way to take care of their guests. This is a slower coffee shop with a great atmosphere for work or study.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing coffee and even better people. Langdon was great and super intentional.

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee at Station West is THE BEST!! The drinks are always fantastic with delicious seasonal creations. The baristas are top notch. reviews_data.review_text: I love this coffee shop. It has a great atmosphere, coffee, and food! The baristas are really nice and I love their service. They put the customer first in Everything.

reviews_data.review_text: I love this place!! If you’re looking for the perfect coffee shop aesthetic, a bright room, and incredible service—you should definitely come here!!! Langdon is also the best barista!!

reviews_data.review_text: I have been delivering bread/pastries here for the past 5 almost 6 months and everyone who works here is very friendly and welcoming. They all work with a smile and get you taken care of in a very timely manner. S/o to Jaz for always taking care of me :)

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great place to get some work done and to hangout with friends. Friendly staff, great coffee and great food.

reviews_data.review_text: Station West is my third space as I love the community feel it has. Everyone on the team is fantastic, but barista and roaster Langdon is top notch, keep an eye out for his nordic roast.

reviews_data.review_text: What a joy station west is! It is evident that the staff cares for one another and each guest who enters their doors! reviews_data.review_text: Going to CSW is a staple in my family’s daily routine. The atmosphere, coffee and food are absolutely incredible! Their staff feels more like a family and are seriously some of the kindest people I have ever met. We love y’all!

reviews_data.review_text: I love the outside space! I enjoyed my coffee and waffle!!

reviews_data.review_text: THIS PLACE WAS SO GOOD! i’m such a coffee snob and i loved it! the coffee was delish and the service was great!
reviews_data.owner_answer: EMMA! ;) Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We're glad we passed your test, come back again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: the best coffee shop in Charlotte.💯
reviews_data.owner_answer: Fatima, thank you for your 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: This coffee shop has a very distinct look to it and an open atmosphere. I loved the different styles of seating and the overall design of the space. I ordered a moonlight latte which has coffee, ube, and sweetened condensed milk. It was just alright to me. However, I would definitely come back again to try something new since it was just a cool looking place to hangout, chat, and grab a coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello CJ! Thanks for coming to try us out! Hope to see you again soon, and thank you for your review!

reviews_data.review_text: cant say enough about this place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your five stars and for supporting our business! We appreciate it!

reviews_data.review_text: Gentrification at its best. Employees treat the majority of the customers with great service but if you don’t fit the description of their ideal customer you will get the worst service ever. Guess they are unaware of their location.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hello Natasha, 
We’re so sorry you didn’t enjoy your experience with us. This makes us sad to hear because we strive to be a welcoming space in our neighborhood and want to do everything we can to achieve that, we’re sorry you didn’t experience that.

reviews_data.review_text: Great environment. Friendly staff and awesome coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Matt, thank you for your review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit and hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Came here to work remotely and had a great time. Good atmosphere and the beef chili was so good!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Camille! Thanks for sharing your experience, we're glad you enjoyed the beef chili!

reviews_data.review_text: The waffles here are so delicious and the employees are the sweetest!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Addien! Our waffles are definitely a fan favorite! Thanks for coming by!

reviews_data.review_text: love the environment of this coffee shop, the baristas are friendly and the coffee was amazing. they also have really good baked goods!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Emma! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience at our coffee shop, baked goods and all. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
My smoothie and chocolate croissant were delicious.
Both baristas that served me were very sweet!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Keely! Thank you for choosing Coffee at Station West! We're happy to have been a part of your day! :)

reviews_data.review_text: My iced matcha was delicious and so was my waffle. The baristas name was Elliot and she was so sweet!

review_questions.Vegetarian offerings: Clearly labeled vegetarian dishes, Not sure

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Megan! Your kind words mean the world to us, and to Elliot! ;) We look forward to serving you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love the atmosphere it’s a great place to work from. The yogurt bowl was really good and so was the oat milk matcha latte. My husband loved the chocolate croissant and chai latte.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Brooke! Thanks for visiting! We’re glad you enjoyed the bowl and yogurt!

reviews_data.review_text: Beautiful space to grab a coffee. Vibes are top notch
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming, Ryan! We're so glad you enjoyed being here and hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is amazing ! I ordered the buttermilk waffles with strawberries . Omg delicious!! The perfect amount of sweetness. My hubby got a dark roast and said it was so good. I also had a iced Caramel latte with almond milk and it truly was one of the top 3 lattes Ive had. If I'm ever back in this area we will definitely be hitting this place up again
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Stacey! Thank you for your kind review, we appreciate you stopping by!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice people, good coffee
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Melissa! Thank you for your 5 star review! Come back anytime :)

reviews_data.review_text: I stopped by today (the day before thanksgiving) on a whim because my daughter had to use the restroom after picking up goodies at a bakery nearby. The staff was incredibly welcoming and the drinks were delicious. We also got a waffle to try which both my girls devoured. They both have already asked to come back so we will definitely make a point to return and try more of their menu items.
reviews_data.owner_answer: It was a pleasure serving you today, thank you for stopping by! We're so glad you enjoyed your waffle. See you soon we hope!

reviews_data.review_text: Drinks and food are both well-priced and delicious 😋
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for stopping by Bri! And thank you for your review, pleasure serving you!

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee at Station West is a must go. The space is great with lots of light and space, the team there is friendly and guided to the perfect drink selection for me. They recommended the honey cinnamon latte which I got with oak milk. The latte was delicious. I also got a scone (Carmelo we onion and Gruyère) which was also excellent.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Joe! Thank you for your review! We can't wait to serve you again! Thank you for your support.

reviews_data.review_text: Love it here. I worked here all day pretty much and realized I stayed 45 minutes after they closed and no one kicked me out, that’s very sweet (I would’ve kicked me out). So - sorry I stayed late, I didn’t realize. Shout out to the girl working today. 10/10 place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jacqueline! No need to apologize! We're so glad you enjoyed coming to our spot and hope you come back! Thank you for leaving a review!

reviews_data.review_text:
So glad I found this place! New to the area and after trying two other places and being so disappointed in the unfriendly and unwelcoming customer service, this was such a nice change. Great coffee and friendly staff that make you want to actually stay awhile. The atmosphere and furnishings are super cute, modern, and still cozy. I will be back! (And I have to try the food one of these next times).

UPDATE: if I could give this place SIX stars I would. I just love this place. The people are so friendly and welcoming. I don’t even want to go to other coffee shops anymore. You guys have done something great here. Oh and the food is amazing. I love the porridge. The maple scone was delish. And the prosciutto panini was another win.
reviews_data.owner_answer: It’s such a pleasure to serve you Samantha! Welcome to Charlotte! Come back anytime!

reviews_data.review_text: Beautiful coffee shop. The porridge was delicious!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review Marjorie! We love the porridge as well!

reviews_data.review_text:
Wonderful spot with great coffee and super friendly staff and ownership! Lots of space inside and outside in the courtyard for studying, working, or hanging out.

The specialty latte options are always on point. Super interesting and delicious homemade flavors. Oh, and make sure to try the waffle while you're there!! 🧇😍 One of our faves along with the avocado toast and the chocolate croissant!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi John! Thank you for your detailed review! We are grateful for your positive feedback!

reviews_data.review_text: Cute coffee shop with lots of space to sit and even a large conference room to book if you’d like to work more privately. Good ambiance and friendly staff. Very dog-friendly, they offered a pup-cup for each of the two dogs I had with me. Both indoor and outdoor seating available.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Brian! Thank you for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear you had a great experience.

reviews_data.review_text: Excellent coffee and food, nice setting.  Confetence room for rent is great idea
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Matthew! It was our pleasure to serve you! and thank you! ;)

reviews_data.review_text: First time visiting as I am new to Charlotte. The avocado toast is amazing. Great friendly staff and the location is great.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello and welcome to Charlotte! Thank you for visiting us! Come back anytime :)

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee spot to start your morning. They open at 7:00 am during the week which is a great draw compared to other area craft coffee spots that don't open until 8:00 am. There is plenty of free parking on site and a generous amount of indoor and outdoor seating options.  For breakfast, I had the oat porridge with dried fruit and my friend had the avocado toast. Both dishes were delicious and ready in a timely manner. For my drink, I ordered a drip coffee, and appreciated the offering of a light or dark roast.

review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Noah! Thank you for your detailed review! We're so happy you enjoyed your experience with us. Come back anytime!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely one of the best places to get some coffee and work done. Starting with unique drink options to super friendly staff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Margarita! Thank you for your review! Always happy to serve you!

reviews_data.review_text: Coffee at Station West is one of my favorite places to get work done. I absolutely love the aesthetics of the shop. The atmosphere is great, the employees are very friendly and welcoming. And of course the food and drinks are delicious.
reviews_data.owner_answer: It was a pleasure having you! Come visit anytime, we're glad you enjoyed our space and coffee!

reviews_data.review_text:
Great coffee.
Great food choices.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jim! So glad you enjoyed our coffee and food, thanks for stopping in!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to sit and relax or work. Coffee is excellent, and waffles are the best. Great add to the neighborhood
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for visiting Jeff! :)

reviews_data.review_text: Cool spot to study.. the waffle was the best part..
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your review Michelle! The waffle is pretty irresistible, we agree. ;)

reviews_data.review_text: This was the perfect place to work and caffeine myself when the Airbnb internet failed. My latte was delicious and one of the best coffee shop croissants ever. My avocado toast was okay. Incredibly fresh on delicious bread but a little blah. Personal preference perhaps. What the toast lacked, the staff made up for in service. They were helpful and did little extras around the shop that added to the customer experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Aishia, thank you for your detailed review! We're glad you enjoyed your experience and happy to be of service while your internet was out. We're sorry to hear your avocado toast was lacking, please come back to visit us soon as we have a new food menu launching with a revamped avocado toast! Hope to see you again!

reviews_data.review_text: One of the best Matcha I’ve had 🫶🏼
reviews_data.owner_answer: Woohoo! So glad you enjoyed it! Come back for another soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: Best coffee in west Charlotte
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind review!

reviews_data.review_text: I love this place, the food and coffee are excellent…but bring headphones if gospel isn’t your jam.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for visiting Jess! We're so glad you enjoyed our food and coffee. We do like to play music ;) if it's ever too loud or you'd like to request to change it, just let us know!

reviews_data.review_text: They had a very creative summer drink menu! The salted honey rosemary latte was *fantastic*-- they make their rosemary syrup in-house. Very very cute place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Marcie, thank you for your review! The Old West is one of our favorites too. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: The manager jazmine is so incredibly knowledgable, friendly and helpful, the coffee was superb and the atmosphere was fantastic especially for taking some pictures my daughter needed. Will be back for sure!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hello Mari, thank you for your review! So glad you had a good experience visiting us. We look forward to making you another drink!

reviews_data.review_text: I had a really good bagel and latte. The space is warm and inviting both inside and out with various forms of seating. Worth a try.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Delisa, we're glad you enjoyed your bagel and latte!

reviews_data.review_text: I never leave reviews but I just love this place so much 🥹 10/10 experience every time. The staff is so sweet and warm, the atmosphere is so cozy and the coffee is consistently amazing and reasonably priced.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Abby for your review! We love making Station West a community! :)

reviews_data.review_text: Si quieres beber buen café de origen, es el mejor lugar en Charlotte para hacerlo!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Gracias! ;) Thanks for stopping by! Come see us again!

reviews_data.review_text: I only had a latte but it was great! Super cute and trendy spot.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so glad you enjoyed it! Come visit us again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
The atmosphere is nice, but my iced coffee was really bitter.  I've been here a few times and would say it's a hit or miss.  I think I more often got bitter, weird tasting coffee than something I actually enjoyed.

I'd recommend Not Just Coffee just up the road for a better cup of coffee.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for coming to visit us. We just got some new drinks and would love to have your opinion on them!
